1.description: Channel your Chi to unleash devastating fury! Punching attacks do 20% more damage to your opponent.

2.description: Punching attacks now do 40% more damage and can disarm your opponent. (Requires: Level 9)

3.description: Punching attacks now do 60% more damage. Unarmed Power Attacks have a chance to cripple one of your opponent's limbs. (Requires: Level 18)

4.description: Punching attacks now do 80% more damage. Unarmed Power Attacks have an increased chance to cripple one of your opponent's limbs. (Requires: Level 31)

5.description: Punching attacks now do double damage. Criticals in V.A.T.S will paralyze your opponent. (Requires: Level 46)

1.description: Swing for the fences! Do 20% more melee weapon damage.

2.description: You now do 40% more melee weapon damage and gain a chance to disarm your opponent. (Requires: Level 7)

3.description: You now do 60% more melee weapon damage and gain an increased chance to disarm your opponent. (Requires: Level 15)

4.description: You now do 80% more melee weapon damage and hit all targets in front of you. (Requires: Level 27)

5.description: You now do double damage with a melee weapon, and gain a chance to cripple your opponent, or grand slam their head clean off! (Requires: Level 42)

1.description: Protect yourself from the dangers of the Wasteland with access to base level and Rank 1 armor mods.

2.description: You gain access to Rank 2 armor mods. (Requires: Level 13)

3.description: You gain access to Rank 3 armor mods. (Requires: Level 25)

4.description: You gain access to Rank 4 armor mods. (Requires: Level 39)

1.description: Fire up the forge and gain access to base level and Rank 1 melee weapon mods.

2.description: You gain access to Rank 2 melee weapon mods. (Requires: Level 16)

3.description: You gain access to Rank 3 melee weapon mods. (Requires: Level 29)

1.description: Thanks to practice and conditioning, heavy guns do 20% more damage.

2.description: Heavy guns now do 40% more damage, and have improved hip fire accuracy. (Requires: Level 11)

3.description: Heavy guns now do 60% more damage. Hip fire accuracy is increased even more. (Requires: Level 21)

4.description: Heavy guns now do 80% more damage and have a chance to stagger your opponent. (Requires: Level 35)

5.description: Heavy guns now do double damage. (Requires: Level 47)

1.description: What are you, part pack mule? Gain +25 to carry weight.

2.description: You now have +50 to carry weight. (Requires: Level 10)

3.description: When over encumbered you can use Action Points to run. (Requires: Level 20)

4.description: When over encumbered you can fast travel. (Requires: Level 30)

5.description: While over-encumbered, running costs 50% fewer action points. (Requires: Level 40)

1.description: Stay on target! Hip fire accuracy is improved when firing any gun

2.description: Hip fire accuracy is improved even more when firing any gun. (Requires: Level 28)

3.description: Hip fire damage is improved by 5% firing any gun. (Requires: Level 49)

1.description: Get up close and personal! Gun bashing does 25% more damage.

2.description: Gun bashing now does 50% more damage and possibly cripples your opponent. (Requires: Level 5)

3.description: Gun bashing now does 75% more damage and has an increased chance to cripple your opponent. (Requires: Level 14)

4.description: Gun bashing does double damage and has an increased chance to cripple your opponent. It may also inflict a Critical Hit. (Requires: Level 26)

1.description: You're part tree! While standing still, you gain +25 Damage Resistance and your melee and unarmed attacks deal 25% more damage.

2.description: While standing still, you now gain +50 Damage Resistance and your melee and unarmed attacks deal 50% more damage. (Requires: Level 22)

3.description: While standing still, you may automatically disarm enemies that use melee weapons against you. (Requires: Level 43)

1.description: Choo Choo! All aboard! While wearing Power Armor, sprinting into enemies hurts and staggers them. Robots and over sized enemies are immune.

2.description: Sprinting into enemies while wearing Power Armor now causes severe damage and a more powerful stagger. Robots and over sized enemies are immune. (Requires: Level 24)

3.description: Sprinting into enemies while wearing Power Armor now causes massive damage and knocks them down. Impact Landing near enemies from heights causes a more powerful area-of-effect Power Slam.(Requires: Level 50)

1.description: Your quick hands and sticky fingers make picking pockets 25% easier.

2.description: Picking pockets is now 50% easier. You can place a live grenade in a person's inventory. (Requires: Level 6)

3.description: Picking pockets is now 75% easier, and you can steal equipped weapons. (Requires: Level 17)

4.description: Picking pockets is now twice as easy, and you can steal equipped items. (Requires: Level 31)

1.description: Keep your distance long and your kill count high. Attacks with non-automatic rifles do 20% more damage.

2.description: Attacks with non-automatic rifles do 40% more damage and ignore 15% of a target's armor. (Requires: Level 9)

3.description: Attacks with non-automatic rifles do 60% more damage and ignore 20% of a target's armor. (Requires: Level 18)

4.description: Attacks with non-automatic rifles do 80% more damage and ignore 25% of a target's armor. They also have a slight chance of crippling a limb. (Requires: Level 31)

5.description: Attacks with non-automatic rifles do double damage and ignore 30% of a target's armor. They also have a slightly higher chance of crippling a limb. (Requires: Level 46)

1.description: To defeat your enemies, know their weaknesses! You can view a target's specific damage resistances in V.A.T.S.

2.description: Increases hit chance and damage in V.A.T.S by 5% (Requires: Level 14)

1.description: Your nimble fingers allow you to pick Advanced locks.

2.description: You can pick Expert locks. (Requires: Level 7)

3.description: You can pick Master locks. (Requires: Level 18)

4.description: Your bobby pins never break during lockpicking. (Requires: Level 41)

1.description: The bigger the boom, the better! Your explosives do 25% more damage, and you can craft explosives at any Chemistry Station.

2.description: Your explosives do 50% more damage, and grenades gain a throwing arc. (Requires: Level 10)

3.description: Your explosives do 75% more damage and affect a larger area. (Requires: Level 22)

4.description: Your explosives now do double damage. Mines and grenades shot in V.A.T.S explode for double damage, too. (Requires: Level 34)

1.description: You are a creature of the night! Gain +2 to Intelligence and Perception between the hours of 6:00 p.m. and 6:00 a.m.

2.description: You now have +3 to Intelligence and Perception between the hours of 6:00 p.m. and 6:00 a.m., and night vision when sneaking. (Requires: Level 25)

3.description: You have 30 extra health between the hours of 6 PM and 6 AM. (Requires: Level 37)

1.description: You must be part mirror! Instantly gain +10 Energy Resistance.

2.description: You now have +20 Energy Resistance. (Requires: Level 11)

3.description: You now have +30 Energy Resistance. (Requires: Level 21)

4.description: You now have +40 Energy Resistance. (Requires: Level 35)

5.description: You now have +50 Energy Resistance. (Requires: Level 42)

1.description: It's all about focus. You have improved control and can hold your breath longer when aiming with scopes.

2.description: Non-automatic, scoped rifles have a chance of knocking down your target. (Requires: Level 13)

3.description: Non-automatic, scoped rifles gain +25% accuracy to head shot in V.A.T.S. (Requires: Level 26)

1.description: There's no place to hide! In V.A.T.S you can target an enemy's body parts that are blocked by cover, with a decrease in accuracy.

2.description: In V.A.T.S when you target an enemy's body parts that are blocked by cover, there is no decrease in accuracy. (Requires: Level 28)

1.description: Stay Focused! In V.A.T.S every attack on the same body part gains +10% accuracy.

2.description: In V.A.T.S every attack on the same body part gains +15% accuracy. (Requires: Level 26)

3.description: In V.A.T.S every attack on the same body part gains +20% accuracy and does 20% more damage. (Requires: Level 50)

1.description: If nothing else, you can take a beating! Instantly gain +10 Damage Resistance

2.description: You now have +20 damage resistance. (Requires: Level 9)

3.description: You now have +30 damage resistance. (Requires: Level 18)

4.description: You now have +40 damage resistance. (Requires: Level 31)

5.description: You now have +50 damage resistance. (Requires: Level 46)

1.description: Your digestive tract has adjusted to the weirdness of the Wasteland! Take less radiation from eating or drinking.

2.description: You take even less radiation from eating or drinking. (Requires: Level 6)

3.description: You take no radiation from eating or drinking. (Requires: Level 17)

1.description: You embody wellness! Instantly gain +20 maximum Health.

2.description: You instantly gain another +20 maximum Health. (Requires: Level 8)

3.description: You instantly gain another +20 maximum Health, and slowly regenerate lost Health. (Requires: Level 20)

1.description: All the rush without the hassle! You're 50% less likely to get addicted when consuming Chems.

2.description: You gain complete immunity to chem addiction. (Requires: Level 22)

1.description: Water is your ally. You no longer take radiation damage from swimming, and can breathe underwater.

2.description: You become totally undetectable while submerged. (Requires: Level 21)

1.description: Exposure to the Wasteland has made you more resilient, instantly granting +10 Radiation Resistance.

2.description: You now have +20 Radiation Resistance. (Requires: Level 13)

3.description: You now have +30 Radiation Resistance. (Requires: Level 26)

4.description: You now have +40 Radiation Resistance. (Requires: Level 35)

1.description: Your skeleton has been infused with indestructible metal, reducing limb damage by 30%.

2.description: Your limb damage is now reduced by 60%. (Requires: Level 13)

3.description: Your limb damage is completely eliminated. (Requires: Level 26)

1.description: Feast on mortal flesh to heal your wounds! Eating human corpses restores Health.

2.description: Eating Ghoul or Super Mutant corpses restores Health. (Requires: Level 19)

3.description: Eating human, Ghoul or Super Mutant corpses now restores a significant amount of Health. (Requires: Level 38)

1.description: Sure, you're still human - on the outside! Radiation now regenerates your lost Health.

2.description: Radiation now regenerates even more of your lost Health. (Requires: Level 24)

3.description: Radiation now regenerates even more of your lost Health, and some Feral Ghouls will randomly become friendly. (Requires: Level 48)

4.description: Rad damage will now begin to slowly heal, restoring health in the process. (Requires: Level 49)

1.description: Catch some rays! Gain +2 to Strength and Edurance between the hours of 6:00a.m. and 6:00p.m.

2.description: Sunlight slowly heals your radiation damage. (Requires: Level 27)

3.description: Sunlight slowly regenerates your lost Health. (Requires: Level 50)

1.description: You've mastered the art of the deal! Buying and selling prices at vendors are better.

2.description: Buying and selling prices of vendors are now much better. (Requires: Level 20)

3.description: You can now invest a total of 500 caps to raise a store's buying capacity. (Requires: Level 41)

1.description: You're charming... and dangerous. Men/Women suffer +5% damage in combat, and are easier to persuade in dialogue.

2.description: Men/Women now suffer +10% damage in combat, and are even easier to persuade in dialogue. They are also easier to pacify with the Intimidation perk. (Requires: Level 7)

3.description: Men/Women now suffer +15% damage in combat, and are much easier to persuade in dialogue. They are now even easier to pacify with the Intimidation perk. (Requires: Level 16)

1.description: Who needs friends, anyway? When adventuring without a companion, you take 15% less damage and carry weight increases by 50.

2.description: When adventuring without a companion, you take 30% less damage and carry weight increases by 100. (Requires: Level 17)

3.description: When adventuring without a companion, you do 25% more damage. (Requires: Level 40)

4.description: When adventuring without a companion, you have 25 more action points. (Requires: Level 50)

1.description: Your faithful canine companion can hold an enemy, giving you a greater chance to hit them in V.A.T.S.

2.description: When your dog holds an enemy, there's a chance he'll cripple the limb he's biting. (Requires: Level 9)

3.description: When your dog holds an enemy, there's a chance he'll cause them to bleed. (Requires: Level 25)

4.description: When adventuring with your dog, you take 10% less damage. (Requires: Level 31)

1.description: Commune with beasts! With your gun, aim at any animal below your level and gain a chance to pacify it.

2.description: When you successfully pacify an animal, you can incite it to attack. (Requires: Level 12)

3.description: When you successfully pacify an animal, you can give it specific commands. (Requires: Level 28)

1.description: As the ruler everyone turns to, you are able to establish supply lines between your workshop settlements.

2.description: You can build stores and workstations at workshop settlements. (Requires: Level 14)

1.description: Nobody has a good time like you! There's no chance you'll get addicted to alcohol.

2.description: The effects of alcohol are doubled. (Requires: Level 15)

3.description: Your Luck is increased by 3 while you're under the influence of alcohol. (Requires: Level 37)

1.description: Because you lead by example, your companion does more damage in combat, and cannot hurt you.

2.description: Your companion resists more damage in combat, and can't be harmed by your attacks. (Requires: Level 19)

3.description: Your companion can carry more items. (Requires: Level 43)

1.description: Master the post-apocalypse! With your gun, aim at any Wasteland creature below your level and gain a chance to pacify it.

2.description: When you successfully pacify a creature, you can incite it to attack. (Requires: Level 21)

3.description: When you successfully pacify a creature, you can give it specific commands. (Requires: Level 49)

1.description: Time to show everyone who's boss! With your gun, aim at any human opponent below your level and gain a chance to pacify them.

2.description: When you successfully pacify someone, you can incite them to attack. (Requires: Level 23)

3.description: When you successfully pacify someone, you can give them specific commands. (Requires: Level 50)

1.description: Let Vault-Tec guide you! The path to your closest quest target is displayed in V.A.T.S.

2.description: Gain +2 to Perception. (Requires: Level 36)

1.description: Is there a doctor in the house? Stimpaks restore 40% of lost Health, and RadAway removes 40% of radiation.

2.description: Stimpaks restore 60% of lost Health, and RadAway removes 60% of radiation. (Requires: Level 18)

3.description: Stimpaks restore 80% of lost Health, and RadAway removes 80% of radiation. (Requires: Level 30)

4.description: Stimpaks and RadAway restore all lost health and radiation, and work much more quickly. (Requires: Level 46)

1.description: You gain access to base level and Rank 1 gun mods.

2.description: You gain access to Rank 2 gun mods. (Requires: Level 13)

3.description: You gain access to Rank 3 gun mods. (Requires: Level 25)

4.description: You gain access to Rank 4 gun mods. (Requires: Level 39)

1.description: Knowledge of cutting-edge computer encryption allows you to hack Advanced terminals.

2.description: You can hack Expert terminals. (Requires: Level 9)

3.description: You can hack Master terminals. (Requires: Level 21)

4.description: When hacking, you never get locked out of a terminal when things go wrong. (Requires: Level 33)

1.description: Waste not, want not! You can salvage uncommon components like screws, aluminum, and copper when scrapping weapons and armor.

2.description: You can salvage rare components like circuitry, nuclear material, and fiber optics when scrapping weapons and armor. Items with favorited components are highlighted. (Requires: Level 23)

3.description: You get more from salvaging.(Requires: Level 40)

1.description: Take full advantage of advanced technology with access to base level and Rank 1 high-tech mods.

2.description: You gain access to Rank 2 high-tech mods. (Requires: Level 17)

3.description: You gain access to Rank 3 high-tech mods. (Requires: Level 28)

4.description: You gain access to Rank 4 high-tech mods. (Requires: Level 41)

1.description: Any chems you take last 50% longer. Far out.

2.description: Any chems you take now last twice as long. (Requires: Level 16)

3.description: Any chems you take now last an additional 150% longer. (Requires: Level 32)

4.description: Any chems you take now last an additional 200% longer. (Requires: Level 45)

1.description: Machines will always serve humans, if you have anything to say about it. Hack a robot, and gain a chance to power it on or off, or initiate a self-destruct.

2.description: When you successfully hack a robot, you can incite it to attack. (Requires: Level 19)

3.description: When you successfully hack a robot, you can give it specific commands. (Requires: Level 44)

1.description: You've learned to split the atom... and command it. Radiation weapons do 50% more damage and Fusion Cores last an extra 25% longer.

2.description: Radiation weapons now do double damage and Fusion Cores last an extra 50% longer. (Requires: Level 14)

3.description: Fusion Cores can be ejected from Power Armor like devastating grenades and Fusion Cores last twice as long. (Requires: Level 26)

1.description: Genius. Is. ANGRY! When your Health drops below 20%, time slows and you gain +20 Damage resistance and do 20% more damage while the effect lasts.

2.description: You now gain 30 more Damage Resistance and do 30% more damage while Nerd Rage is in effect. (Requires: Level 31)

3.description: You now gain 40 more Damage Resistance and do 40% more damage while Nerd Rage is in effect. Kills you make while enraged restore some lost Health. (Requires: Level 50)

1.description: Channel the spirit of the old west! Non-automatic pistols do 20% more damage.

2.description: Non-automatic pistols now do 40% more damage and have increased range. (Requires: Level 7)

3.description: Non-automatic pistols now do 60% more damage and range is increased even further. (Requires: Level 15)

4.description: Non-automatic pistols now do 80% more damage and their attacks can disarm opponents. (Requires: Level 27)

5.description: Non-automatic pistols now do double damage. Their attacks have a much better chance to disarm opponents, and may even cripple a limb. (Requires: Level 42)

1.description: Rigorous combat training means automatic weapons do 20% more damage.

2.description: Attacks with automatic weapons do 40% more damage, with improved hip fire accuracy. (Requires: Level 11)

3.description: Attacks with automatic weapons do 60% more damage. Hip fire accuracy is improved even more. (Requires: Level 21)

4.description: Attacks with automatic weapons do 80% more damage and gain a chance to stagger opponents. (Requires: Level 35)

5.description: Your automatic weapons now do double damage and have a greater chance to stagger opponents. (Requires: Level 49)

1.description: Become whisper, become shadow. You are 20% harder to detect while sneaking.

2.description: You are now 30% harder to detect while sneaking, and no longer trigger floor-based traps. (Requires: Level 5)

3.description: You are now 40% harder to detect while sneaking, and no longer trigger enemy mines. (Requires: Level 12)

4.description: You are now 50% harder to detect while sneaking, and running no longer adversely affects stealth. (Requires: Level 23)

5.description: Engaging stealth causes distant enemies to lose you. (Requires: Level 38)

1.description: As an agent of death, you can instantly kill a sleeping person. Your silenced weapons do an additional 15% sneak attack damage.

2.description: Your silenced weapons do an additional 30% sneak attack damage. (Requires: Level 17)

3.description: Your silenced weapons now do 50% more sneak attack damage. (Requires: Level 30)

1.description: There's no time to waste! Action Points regenerate 25% faster.

2.description: Your Action Points now regenerate 50% faster. (Requires: Level 18)

3.description: Your Action Points now regenerate 75% faster. (Requires: Level 38)

1.description: They can't hurt what they can't hit! Get 25+ Damage Resistance and 25+ Energy Resistance when you're sprinting.

2.description: You now get +50 Damage Resistance and +50 Energy Resistance when you're sprinting. (Requires: Level 24)

3.description: Sprinting costs 50% fewer Action Points. (Requires: Level 44)

1.description: Trained as a shadow warrior, your ranged sneak attack do 2.5x normal damage and your melee sneak attacks do 4x normal damage.

2.description: Your ranged sneak attacks do 3x normal damage and your melee sneak attacks do 5x normal damage. (Requires: Level 16)

3.description: Your ranged sneak attacks do 3.5x normal damage and your melee sneak attacks do 10x normal damage. (Requires: Level 33)

1.description: In combat, there's no time to hesitate. You can reload all guns faster.

2.description: Reloading guns costs no Action Points in V.A.T.S. (Requires: Level 23)

3.description: You gain 10 additional Action Points. (Requires: Level 40)

1.description: Find the gap and make the tackle! V.A.T.S. melee distance is increased significantly.

2.description: V.A.T.S. melee distance is increased even more, and the farther the Blitz distance, the greater the damage.(Requires: Level 29)

1.description: You've learned to apply ancient martial arts to gunplay! Do 25% more damage to your second V.A.T.S. target and beyond.

2.description: In V.A.T.S. you do 50% more damage to your third target and beyond. (Requires: Level 26)

3.description: In V.A.T.S. you instantly do a Critical Hit against your fourth target and beyond. (Requires: Level 50)

1.description: You find more bottle caps in containers.

2.description: You find even more bottle caps in containers. (Requires: Level 5)

3.description: You find even more bottle caps in containers. (Requires: Level 25)

4.description: You find even more bottle caps in containers, and there is a chance of enemies exploding into a shower of caps when you kill them. (Requires: Level 40)

1.description: You find more ammunition in containers.

2.description: You find even more ammunition in containers. (Requires: Level 7)

3.description: You find even more ammunition in containers. (Requires: Level 24)

4.description: There is a chance to gain ammo when firing the last round in your clip (Requires: Level 37)

1.description: +5% bonus damage means enemies will sometimes explode into a gory red paste. Watch out for flying eyeballs!

2.description: You now inflict +10% damage in combat. (Requires: Level 9)

3.description: You now inflict +15% damage in combat. (Requires: Level 31)

4.description: When an enemy explodes, nearby enemies may suffer the same fate. (Requires: Level 47)

1.description: Who is he? Why does he help? Who cares! The Mysterious Stranger will appear occasionally in V.A.T.S. to lend a hand, with deadly efficiency..

2.description: The Mysterious Stranger appears more often in V.A.T.S. (Requires: Level 22)

3.description: The Mysterious Stranger appears more often in V.A.T.S. When he kills an opponent, there is a chance your Critical meter gets filled. (Requires: Level 41)

4.description: The Mysterious Stranger appears more often in V.A.T.S. When he kills an opponent, there is a high chance your Critical meter gets filled. (Requires: Level 49)

1.description: You're not stupid! Just... different. Randomly receive 3x XP from any action, and the lower your Intelligence, the greater the chance.

2.description: You now randomly receive 5x XP from any action. The lower your Intelligence, the greater the chance. (Requires: Level 11)

3.description: Randomly receiving bonus XP from any action may trigger 3x XP for all kills for a short period of time. The lower your Intelligence, the greater the chance. (Requires: Level 34)

1.description: Advanced training for enhanced combat effectiveness! Criticals do 50% more extra damage.

2.description: Your criticals now do twice as much extra damage. (Requires: Level 15)

3.description: Your criticals now do 2.5x as much extra damage. (Requires: Level 40)

1.description: You're a patient battlefield tactician, and can save a Critical Hit, to be used in V.A.T.S. when you need it most.

2.description: You can now save 2 Critical Hits, to be used in V.A.T.S. when you need them the most. (Requires: Level 17)

3.description: You can now save 3 Critical Hits, to be used in V.A.T.S. when you need them the most. Banking a Critical has a chance to save an additional Critical. (Requires: Level 43)

4.description: You can now save 4 Critical Hits, to be used in V.A.T.S. when you need them the most. (Requires: Level 50)

1.description: Death becomes you! Any kill in V.A.T.S. has a 15% chance to restore all Action Points.

2.description: Any kill in V.A.T.S. now has a 25% chance to restore all Action Points. (Requires: Level 19)

3.description: Any kill in V.A.T.S. has a 35% chance to restore all Action Points and refill your Critical meter. (Requires: Level 46)

1.description: Feeling Lucky? You should! Each hit in V.A.T.S. has a chance of filling your Critical meter.

2.description: Each hit in V.A.T.S. now has an even better chance of filling your Critical meter. <strong>(Requires: Level 13)

3.description: Each hit in V.A.T.S. now has a very good chance of filling your Critical meter. (Requires: Level 32)

4.description: Each hit in V.A.T.S. now has an excellent chance of filling your Critical meter. (Requires: Level 48)

1.description: What goes around comes around! Any enemy's ranged attacks will sometimes ricochet back and instantly kill them. The closer you are to death, the higher the chance.

2.description: There's an increased chance that an enemy's shot will ricochet back and kill them. (Requires: Level 29)

3.description: When an enemy's shot ricochets back and kills them, there is a chance your Critical meter gets filled. (Requires: Level 50)
